subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez of the Yankees and David Wright of the Mets both play third base in New York City. They will also both be honored with Munson Awards on Feb. 5.
snippet: Alex Rodriguez of the Yankees and David Wright of the Mets both play third base in New York City. They will also both be honored with Munson Awards on Feb. 5.
